description: 8 anchor images that define the character from all essential angles/poses

anchors.name: Front Standing
anchors.pose_prompt: standing facing camera front view, arms relaxed at sides, feet shoulder width apart, neutral standing pose, full body shot from head to toe

anchors.name: Back Standing
anchors.pose_prompt: standing with back to camera rear view, arms relaxed at sides, showing full back muscles, full body shot from head to toe

anchors.name: Side Profile
anchors.pose_prompt: standing side profile view, facing left, arms at sides, showing full body silhouette, full body shot from head to toe

anchors.name: Three-Quarter View
anchors.pose_prompt: standing three-quarter angle view, body turned 45 degrees to camera, dynamic stance, full body shot from head to toe

anchors.name: Arms Raised
anchors.pose_prompt: standing front view with both arms raised overhead, hands reaching up, shoulders engaged, full body shot from head to toe

anchors.name: Bent Over
anchors.pose_prompt: bent over at waist, torso parallel to ground, knees slightly bent, arms hanging down, side angle view, full body shot

anchors.name: Seated Position
anchors.pose_prompt: sitting on bench, upright torso, feet flat on ground, hands on thighs, front three-quarter view, full body shot

anchors.name: Hanging from Bar
anchors.pose_prompt: hanging from horizontal pull-up bar, arms fully extended overhead gripping bar, body straight, front view, full body shot
